title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: The report displays the same results regardless of the dynamic text element's Content Type property setting (Auto, Plain, or HTML).
EB:
I expect the following behavior based on the Content Type property setting:

- For Plain, the literal content (including the tags) should be displayed.
- For Auto, content 1, 2, and 3 should be displayed correctly without any HTML or RTF tags.
- For HTML, content 1 and 2 should appear correctly without HTML tags, and content 3 should be displayed literally with RTF tags.

Please refer to the attached report.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:

1. Prepare a database field with the following types of content:
   - HTML text within <html>...</html> tags.
   - HTML fragments not within <html> tags.
   - Text with RTF tags.
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
